response.overview: KT Tunstall performing at the Pleasantville Music Festival @ Parkway Field in Pleasantville, NY on July 9, 2016. Acoustic set recorded ~15th row center, then moved to front of stage. Full band set recorded from front of stage center, then moved to front of stage left. Filmed, edited and authored by larryrulz, July-Nov 2016.  Disc 1 [32:36]: Solo Acoustic - Chill Tent Stage  01 intro - audio only  02 Invisible Empire - audio only  03 Miniature Disasters  04 It Took Me So Long To Get Here, But Here I Am  05 Feel It All  06 The Healer - first 2:00 audio only  07 Suddenly I See  Disc 2 [55:40]: Full Band Set - Main Stage  08 intro  09 Fade Like a Shadow  10 Little Favours  11 Hold On / Walk Like An Egyptian  12 Evil Eye  13 It Took Me So Long To Get Here, But Here I Am  14 Other Side of the World  15 Maybe It's A Good Thing  16 Black Horse and the Cherry Tree / Seven Nation Army  17 Saving My Face  18 The Healer  19 Suddenly I See
response.title: KT Tunstall - Pleasantville Music Festival
